Room.Name: Highland Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Highland Avenue, east of the Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge.
Room.LongDescription: The wide grassy plot on the west of the road is guarded by a tall fence through which you can see many of the richer travelers lounging around. The elegant Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge is a very popular among travelers and other visitors to Oceancrest.
